title: Deterrent Signal
intent: Warn against aggression by signaling immediate costs.

forecast.question: Will the threat press forward despite deterrence?

message_frame.claim: If {THREAT} moves in, the counterstrike will be immediate.
message_frame.evidence: Our units are positioned to punish an incursion.
message_frame.ask: Back me with support or a DMZ to make the threat credible.
